Properties

CacheCapacity

Size of the underlying text mesh cache (in number of entries). If a given text mesh is not in cache a new one must be created by the text mesh generator backend. This is an expensive operation and should be avoided. Every time you ask TextDrawer to draw a new text/font-size combination, it needs to be generated and put back in the cache. Once the cache capacity overflows, the oldest item is discarded to make room for the new one.

public int CacheCapacity { get; set; }

Property Value

int
